Frame:Impoverished

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Name Gloss Impoverished
Transcription
Description
Closest FrameNet Frame(s)
Maps to IARPA Source Concept(s)
Other aliases Being impoverished
Comments The LUs for this frame refer either to poor people (e.g. the indigent) or to the state of being impoverished (e.g. penniless). These elaborate the 'experiencer' and the 'impoverishment' roles of this frame, respectively.
Family The Poor frames, Poverty-related frame network, Poverty frames
Tags Program sources
Type
Cultural Scope American English
Cultural Information
Applicability English

Metaphor Program Alias

Metaphors that use this frame:

as Target frame as Source frame
  • BECOMING IMPOVERISHED IS MOVING DOWNWARDS
  • BEING IMPOVERISHED IS BEING AT A LOW LOCATION
  • BEING IMPOVERISHED IS BEING IN A BOUNDED REGION
  • ENTITLEMENT HOLDERS ARE LEECHES
  • PREVENTION OF BECOMING IMPOVERISHED IS IMPEDING DOWNWARD MOTION
